name: Tross
description: Enter the unforgiving Tross program and fly through a digital world in order to prevent the next Cyberplague.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 285 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i7 2.3ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950 Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Very fun. Just takes a few goes at it to get used to flying, but once you get the hang of it, it's pretty nice. I'd recommend this game if you want a challenge. The music is also really great.
Good graphics, but you can't even fly around with all the blocks everywhere, too much crashing.
